import React, { } from "react" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" const ProfileInfo = ({ profile }) => { const userCurrent = useSelector(state => state.user) console.log(profile) const handleFollow = async() => { } return (
{profile.displayname}

{profile.bio}

0 followers
{profile.username === userCurrent.username ? null : (userCurrent.following.includes(profile.username) ? : )}
) } export default ProfileInfo
